testSteps.description: When I create a new student by providing the information firstName "Prime" lastName "prime1" email "prime1@gmail.com" programme "Computer Science" courses "JAVA"

children.description: Creating student with firstName : 68175Prime, lastName : prime1, email : 99038prime1@gmail.com, programme : Computer Science, courseList : [JAVA]

testSteps.description: Then I verify that the student with "Prime" is created
And I update the student with information firstName "Prime" lastName "prime1" email "prime1@gmail.com" programme "Computer Science" courses "JAVA"
And The student with firstName "Prime" is updated successfully
And I delete the student that created with firstName "Prime"
Then The student deleted successfully from the application
